abstract: Police officials in northwestern Pakistan, in push to curb country's polio crisis, issue hundreds of arrest warrants for parents who refuse to vaccinate their children.
lead_paragraph: Police officials in the northwest province of Khyber-Pakhtunkhwa said they had issued hundreds of arrest warrants for parents who have refused to vaccinate their children.

headline.main: Pakistani Officials Issue Arrest Warrants Over Refusals of Polio Vaccine

snippet: Police officials in the northwest province of Khyber-Pakhtunkhwa said they had issued hundreds of arrest warrants for parents who have refused to vaccinate their children.
